title: (x) Vogue Magazine masthead - (similar to) Didot {Mark S}
content:
hehehe... probably you all know this one by heart. but would you be kind enough to let me know? thanx a lot..   
 [http://opalenik.com/commercial/com-images/vogue-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015855/http:/opalenik.com/commercial/com-images/vogue-1.jpg)   
   
 ![vogue](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015855im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69329.jpg)
author: enriquevw

comments.content: Do you mean the Vogue logotype or one of the others?
hahahahaha.. sorry i guess I should have specified.. I mean the VOGUE logo, the main text.

It's custom drawn, but based on Didot. [Linotype Didot Initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015855/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/didot/linotype-didot-initials/testdrive.html?s=VOGUE&p=72) is fairly close. Another good one is [HTF Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015855/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/didot/index.html).
thats right.. custom drawn.. mhh.. thank a lot man.. really appreciate the help ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015855im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
